content.text:
[@lancew](@W87GwaaxNj0PSBbtc5qUm/A/xOO8AWPdNtJn6hzR8s0=.ed25519) 

Are you getting the `npm install` error building leveldown 1.7.2 or the `npm start` error where Electron segfaults? The [`npm install --save` line](https://github.com/benmosher/eslint-plugin-import/blob/master/docs/rules/no-extraneous-dependencies.md) should solve the former and `rm -rf node_modules/electron` should fix the latter, hopefully.

Currently just waiting on https://github.com/ssbc/scuttle-invite/pull/8 to merge and the former should be fixed, although I can't even keep up with the Electron + glibc drama well enough to know about the latter. Yay, bleeding-edge software!

![this-is-fine.png](&PrmJvZMu8PIZmpceS5Urb7rnzh5YylC8FhkuQqNu7es=.sha256)
